title: crowdmarketnet
author: crowdmarketnet
content: CROWD MARKETLink Building Services by awesome remote teamBuy permanent real-traffic backlinks and propel your keyword rankings to the top positions of search results.Manual Link BuildingOur specialists place links manually, which means you get more winning link building service that powers 1000+ sitesNiche Relevant LinksWe provide quality link building services that offer the strongest backlinks from niche-relevant domainsQ/A on every stepYour project in the dashboard is divided into phases, and testing is carried out at the end of each of themAffordable Link Building with Crowd MarketDespite being the most affordable link building service, we select domains based on 20+ backlink metrics Start your projects easyOur Process of Delivering Link Building ServicesLink order placesOnce you place the order, our dedicated account manager will start processing it and you can keep a track of it using the dedicated dashboardSite ShortlistingOur outreach team will shortlist the websites based on the niche and other quality factors before sending it for your approvalTopic IdeasUnique topic ideas are created based on the focus keywords you have provided and then shared with you for approvalContent ApprovalYou can review the content quality and ensure the links are placed contextually within a positive context.Order DeliveredWe will update the delivery status of your orders in the dedicated dashboard and send awhite labeled report.Pricing & PlansWith lots of CrowdMarket plans, you can easily build backlink profile for your businessSTARTER 10$10910 manual organic links15 days Keyword.com tracking linkFull reportSUPERIOR option availableSTARTER 20$20420 manual organic links 20 days Keyword.com tracking linkFull reportSUPERIOR option availablePROFESSIONAL 50$45950 manual organic links30 days Keyword.com tracking linkFull reportSUPERIOR option availablePROFESSIONAL 100$799100 manual organic links40 days Keyword.com tracking linkFull reportSUPERIOR option availablePROFESSIONAL 200$1599200 manual organic links40 days Possibility for drip-feedKeyword.com tracking linkWhite label reportSUPERIOR option availablePROFESSIONAL 500$3999500 manual organic links40 days Possibility for drip-feedKeyword.com tracking linkWhite label reportSUPERIOR option availableWhat's your TAT ?For the STARTER Package up to 20 days, for the PROFESSIONAL - up to 40 daysDo I have to pay every month ?We provide a monthly service, but you can unsubscribe at any moment and the links will stay forever. Also, every month you get new links from unique domains.Are your links Do follow or No follow ?We have a natural mix of nofollowand do follow links (on average 50/50)What if the link is deleted ?This is very common because we publish comments on strictly moderated platforms. That’s why we offer a one year guarantee! If your link is deleted - just tell us in the order ticket and our team will replace it.Do you work with other languages ?Yes, we can provide links in any language from local sites, including German, French, Italian, Spanish and others. Any foreign language is more expensive (Regular Price + 50%)Do you work with all niches ?Yes, we can provide links for almost every niche.What's your refund policy ?We do provide a refund on request if weare not in TAT, but work will be stopped.Can I buy 2-3 packages for a single site ?Yes, just choose the package you want and every month you'll get new links from new domains.What if I want to place only a one-time order ?Subscribe for the monthly service, pay for the first month, then unsubscribe.How many urls & keywords ?You can provide up to 5 URLs from the same domain & up to 5 keywords for each URL. By default, we use 10% anchors for the keywords you provide, 20% for long tail keywords, and 70% for a naked URL and brand name (you can change it in the order form)How long does it take for google to index CrowdMarket links ?You don’t need to wait. Crowdo links have ALREADY been INDEXED by google.Does the work do automatically ?Yes, we are a SAAS service, and all the work is done automaticallyWe provide quality link building services that offer the strongest backlinks from niche-relevant domains.manager@crowdmarket.nethttps://t.me/crowdmarket_managercrowdmarket.net
